title: Home
description: Pecky - Earn tokens by staking Supra, holding ChickenWings NFTs, and using our Discord bot. 100% community-owned with zero team tokens.

intro.story: Pecky was just a normal chicken… until he ate a weird Dorito behind the barn. Now he thinks he has a secret mission to "uncrack the egg of truth" — whatever that means. He's sure the rooster is a spy and fights scarecrows like they're evil robots.
intro.tokenInfo: No teamtokens, No premine, Pecky is 100% owned by the Supra community.

discord.heading: Link your Discord to Pecky
discord.subtitle: Join the leaderboard, earn Discord roles & get future perks — all tied to your wallet.
discord.connectPrompt: Connect wallet to link your Discord.
discord.invalidDiscordId: Please enter a valid Discord ID (16-20 digits)

earn.heading: Earn Pecky Coin – Daily or Monthly!
earn.subtitle: Want to get free Pecky Coins?
earn.howTo: It's easy. Just Own an NFT or Stake SUPRA.
